parameters: I wonder what's in the package. I can check my
inventory. Maybe try it out. No harm, right?
What are you doing here? Are you breaking the law?
Do you know where I could score some drugs?
Just move along and go about your business then.
You look shifty to me. Don't let me catch you
doing any thing illegal. I mean it!
Ambiguous answers will always be treated as a sign
of guilt. Be careful what you say to the police.
I AM THE LAW! QUESTION ME AT YOUR PERIL!
All right. All right. I was just kidding, right?
Ha ha. Now get along with you.
Do you know where I could score some drugs?
Psst! There's a guy up in the junkyard. He might have
what you're looking for. But I didn't tell you, right?
I could turn you in, you know.
(Smiles) I get a cut. Now off with you.
I could turn you in, you know.
Might be your last living act, friend. Tread
carefully. Nobody's forcing you to be an addict.
It's your decision, and no skin off me.
Hey buddy. What are you up to?
What business do you have here?
I'll be the judge of that. What's in the package?
Let's open it and find out. Oh, it looks like a
contraband substance. I'll have to take that. You're
lucky I don't arrest you. Don't let me see you
Exiter, huh? Ok. I'll let you off with a $20 fine.
Don't have it? That's a problem.
Tell you what. You can pay me next time.
I don't want to arrest you. Too much paperwork.
Maybe you should get along home now. You look
shifty. And I don't much like shifty characters.
Exiter, huh? Ok. I'll let you off with a $20 fine.
Don't have it? That's a problem.
Tell you what. You can pay me next time.
I don't want to arrest you. Too much paperwork.
I'll take that money you owe me. Now.
The police officer fleeced you for $20. You're lucky.
The police officer fleeced you for $20. You're lucky.
That's the ticket. Nice doin' busness wit ya.
Exiter send ya, did he? So... Where's the package?
Hey, I just came to get high.
Yer waistin' my time. Go back and tell that Exiter
I don't deal wit idiots. Ok? R we straight?
Hey, I just came to get high.
Now I could help you tere, friend. What'll ya have?
I could use a stiff drink.
I got some powder you might like. Only twenty bucks.
I could use a stiff drink.
There's a bar nearby. Best place in town.
Yeah. I have a couple of them. Hard to come by.
Bring me more packages if you can. Now scram.
That cop sent you, right? He takes his cut, so I
have to charge a litte more. What do you want?
Hey, I just came to get high.
Yer waistin' my time. Go back and tell that Exiter
I don't deal wit idiots. Ok? R we straight?
Hey, I just came to get high.
Now I could help you tere, friend. What'll ya have?
I could use a stiff drink.
I got some powder you might like. Only twenty bucks.
I could use a stiff drink.
There's a bar nearby. Best place in town.
Yeah. I have a couple of them. Hard to come by.
Bring me more packages if you can. Now scram.
What are you doing here? You a cop? Beat it.
Hey, you must be new here. I can help you find your way.
OK. What is there to do here?
OK. What is there to do here?
I can sell you a handy list of places if you like.
Or would you like a hit of something for your head first?
Sure, I could use a boost right now.
Hey, it's 5 bucks. \| Don't have it?
You trying to chisel me? Get lost.
Sorry. Sold the map. Well.. I didn't exactly have a map,
but if you go to The Rose Palace, that'd be a good start,
Eh? But hey - bygones, right? Here, take a hit......
Sure, I could use a boost right now.
Hey, before you leave... Check out the Rose Palace nearby.
It's a private club, but tell them Grangster sent you.
Sorry. I'm fresh out of goodies, dearie.
Listen, I just need a fix.
Listen, I just need a fix.
We don't let just anyone in, but for you...
How is the old hag? \| Well, what're you waiting for?
That's too bad. Now go away.
